attributes.action: Force all exams in 2021 within the United Kingdom to be cancelled
attributes.additional_details: To protect students from unfair grades based on the school they go to providing more or less teaching during lockdowns, and to protect students who never had a choice of exam boards from being unable to receive centre assessed grades
attributes.background: Make it illegal for any written public external exam, whether from a government regulated exam board or not, to be sat in the United Kingdom during summer 2021 to protect students from unfair treatment due to different levels of online teaching during lockdown

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570228
